OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" SimulationMode="OnDemand" Text="Use this workflow to execute RunBackup workflows configured with the items you want backed up.

[[FileWithItemsToBackup]] - This file has the backup instructions in the format: Computer to Backup | Repository to put them in | Location to Backup | Files to keep.
You can download a template here:
https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/warewolf/SupportContent/Backup/Items+to+Backup.txt

Computer to Backup - The computer name that has the backup location.

Repository to put them in - Where the backups should be placed

Location to Backup - The full UNC path to the file or folder that you want backed up.

Files to keep - The number of backups to keep.

[[FailureEmail]] - The email address to receive any failure notifications" UniqueID="b2dd3b6b-63d6-41d7-a61f-e0f97a290973"><uaba:DsfCommentActivity.AmbientDataList><InOutArgument
